short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Invoke Chrome App from web site throught Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An essential extension to make the ReddiNet Alert Light Chrome App works.  It serves as a communication agent between the ReddiNet application and the ReddiNet Alert Light Chrome App.
